content: has anyone used the new FHIR messaging dev tools from Redox? I was told that you can access dev tools to send FHIR messages using postman. What messages are available to test ?

@Kesara Liyanage I'm from Redox - right now we have "scheduling" and "patient admin" implemented. You can see an example without any kind of signup on the API documentation page. Signing up is free, and that's where you can download the postman collection. You need to auth to the API to actually send content in, so the free signup gets you that as well.
